6. NORTH 27 DEGREES, 28 MINUTES, 00 SECONDS WEST IN AND ALONG SAME 929.81 FEET TO THE POINT AND PLACE OF BEGINNING.

ALL THAT CERTAIN lot, tract, parcel or easement of lands and promises situate, lying and being in the City of Atlantic City, County of Atlantic and State of New Jersey being bounded and described as follows:

BEGINNING at a point in the northerly line of Oriental Avenue ( 60.00 ' wide) said point being 54.00 ' west of the westerly line of Metropolitan Avenue (40.00' wide) and extending from said beginning point thence
1. South 27 degrees 28 minutes 00 seconds East end parallel with Metropolitan Avenue a distance of 60.00 to a point in the southerly tine of Oriental Avenue; thence
2. South 62 degrees 32 minutes 00 seconds West in and along said line a distance of $115.00^{\prime}$ to a point; thence
3. North 27 degrees 28 minutes 00 seconds West and parallel with Metropolitan Avenue a distance of 80.00 to a point within the roadway of Massachusetts Avenue and in the extended southerly line of Oriental Avenue: thence

KNOWN AS a portion of the Oriental and Massachusetts Avenues right of ways as shown on the Atlantic City Tax Map.
